name: AFGEquipmentChild
comment:
They are not saved and thus all actions should be driven by their parent.
If the FGEquipable parent is loaded from save, then their FGEquipmentChild (this) is spawned in PostLoadGame()

methods.name: Equip
methods.comment: Called by Equipable parent when it is equipped

methods.name: UnEquip
methods.comment: Called by UnEquip parent when it is unequiped

methods.name: OnEquip
methods.comment: Called by after equip has run allowing for blueprint functionality

methods.name: OnUnEquip
methods.comment: Called by after Unequip has run allowing for blueprint functionality

properties.name: mParentEquipment
properties.comment: stores a reference to the FGEquipment that spawned this class

properties.name: mAttachSocket
properties.comment: The socket to attach any child equipment to
